docs.snippet: Salvador Perez, indifferent to defense as a boy, is now a Gold Glove-winning catcher for the Royals who has earned the gratitude of umpires by wearing women’s perfume for every game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Salvador Perez, indifferent to defense as a boy, is now a Gold Glove-winning catcher for the Royals who has earned the gratitude of umpires by wearing women’s perfume for every game.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines career of Salvador Perez, Gold Glove-winning catcher for the Kansas City Royals; notes that as a young player Perez seemed indifferent to defense.

headline.seo: Royals’ Salvador Perez Earns Respect for Play and Perfume
headline.print_headline: From Behind the Plate for the Royals: Lights, Catcher, Action!

docs.snippet: Almost 70 years after Jackie Robinson integrated baseball, the upstart Royals are using the same formula that made Robinson and his Negro leagues team, the Kansas City Monarchs, so compelling....
docs.lead_paragraph: Almost 70 years after Jackie Robinson integrated baseball, the upstart Royals are using the same formula that made Robinson and his Negro leagues team, the Kansas City Monarchs, so compelling.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports Of The Times column argues that Kansas City Royals have burst into the World Series in part by using an aggressive base-running strategy that was first used by Jackie Robinson and other players in the Negro leagues seven decades earlier.

headline.main: In Kansas City, Daring Style Spans Years
headline.print_headline: In Kansas City, Daring Style Spans Years

docs.snippet: Bumgarner was almost flawless over seven innings, allowing one run and three hits and striking out five as San Francisco became the first team to beat Kansas City this postseason....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bumgarner was almost flawless over seven innings, allowing one run and three hits and striking out five as San Francisco became the first team to beat Kansas City this postseason.
docs.abstract: San Francisco Giants beat Kansas City Royals, 7-1, in first game of World Series; Giants pitcher Madison Bumgarner puts in nearly flawless performance over seven innings.

headline.main: Giants and Madison Bumgarner Upstage Royals

docs.snippet: Retired Los Angeles Laker Magic Johnson became famous for dishing out assists to his teammates during his Hall of Fame basketball career. Now, as an entrepreneur focused on minority markets, he says he is ready to help Silicon Valley hire more bla...
docs.lead_paragraph: Retired Los Angeles Laker Magic Johnson became famous for dishing out assists to his teammates during his Hall of Fame basketball career. Now, as an entrepreneur focused on minority markets, he says he is ready to help Silicon Valley hire more blacks and Latinos to diversify the technology industry's largely white and Asian workforce.

headline.main: Magic Johnson Ready to Assist Tech in Diversity
headline.print_headline: Magic Johnson Ready to Assist Tech in Diversity
